mapper.sql: a.uuid AS "uuid", a.xmmc AS "xmmc", a.prjnum AS "prjnum", a.prjname AS "prjname", a.ajjgmc AS "ajjgmc", a.ajcorpcode AS "ajcorpcode", a.prjsize AS "prjsize", a.econcorpname AS "econcorpname", a.econcorpcode AS "econcorpcode", a.prjapprovalnum AS "prjapprovalnum", a.buldplannum AS "buldplannum", a.projectplannum AS "projectplannum", a.citynum AS "citynum", a.countynum AS "countynum", a.prjtypenum AS "prjtypenum", a.sprjtypenum AS "sprjtypenum", a.prjfunctionnum AS "prjfunctionnum", a.sbr AS "sbr", a.sbryddh AS "sbryddh", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.sfzps AS "sfzps", a.sfbz AS "sfbz", a.jdz AS "jdz", a.wdz AS "wdz", a.mj AS "mj", a.zj AS "zj", a.jgcc AS "jgcc", a.sbmb AS "sbmb", a.sfjk AS "sfjk", a.sgxkz AS "sgxkz", a.updateflag AS "updateflag", a.fetchdate AS "fetchdate", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.updateuser AS "updateuser", a.updatedate AS "updatedate", a.status AS "status"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ap_ajsbb a
CountyNum = '320211'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT
FROM ap_ajsbb a
CountyNum = '320211'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ap_ajsbb( uuid, xmmc, prjnum, prjname, ajjgmc, ajcorpcode, prjsize, econcorpname, econcorpcode, prjapprovalnum, buldplannum, projectplannum, citynum, countynum, prjtypenum, sprjtypenum, prjfunctionnum, sbr, sbryddh, createdate, sfzps, sfbz, jdz, wdz, mj, zj, jgcc, sbmb, sfjk, sgxkz, updateflag, fetchdate, updatetime, updateuser, updatedate, status ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{xmmc}, #{prjnum}, #{prjname}, #{ajjgmc}, #{ajcorpcode}, #{prjsize}, #{econcorpname}, #{econcorpcode}, #{prjapprovalnum}, #{buldplannum}, #{projectplannum}, #{citynum}, #{countynum}, #{prjtypenum}, #{sprjtypenum}, #{prjfunctionnum}, #{sbr}, #{sbryddh}, #{createdate}, #{sfzps}, #{sfbz}, #{jdz}, #{wdz}, #{mj}, #{zj}, #{jgcc}, #{sbmb}, #{sfjk}, #{sgxkz}, #{updateflag}, #{fetchdate}, #{updatetime}, #{updateuser}, #{updatedate}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ap_ajsbb SET uuid = #{uuid}, xmmc = #{xmmc}, prjnum = #{prjnum}, prjname = #{prjname}, ajjgmc = #{ajjgmc}, ajcorpcode = #{ajcorpcode}, prjsize = #{prjsize}, econcorpname = #{econcorpname}, econcorpcode = #{econcorpcode}, prjapprovalnum = #{prjapprovalnum}, buldplannum = #{buldplannum}, projectplannum = #{projectplannum}, citynum = #{citynum}, countynum = #{countynum}, prjtypenum = #{prjtypenum}, sprjtypenum = #{sprjtypenum}, prjfunctionnum = #{prjfunctionnum}, sbr = #{sbr}, sbryddh = #{sbryddh}, createdate = #{createdate}, sfzps = #{sfzps}, sfbz = #{sfbz}, jdz = #{jdz}, wdz = #{wdz}, mj = #{mj}, zj = #{zj}, jgcc = #{jgcc}, sbmb = #{sbmb}, sfjk = #{sfjk}, sgxkz = #{sgxkz}, updateflag = #{updateflag}, fetchdate = #{fetchdate}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, updateuser = #{updateuser}, updatedate = #{updatedate}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
